body_text.text: These days, there are Saenuri Party, New Politics Alliance for Democracy, and Justice party in South Korea. "Which party do you support?"

BIBREF0.title: Blue collar (Sales/services, Functional/skilled workers, general workers)

BIBREF1.title: White collar (office/technical position, management, professional/freelancer) you divide the standards of living of Korean people into five levels: Upper, Upper middle, Middle, Lower middle, and Lower, which level do you think your household`s living standard belongs to

FIGREF0.text: Do you think MERS epidemic will settle down in the next few days or spread further?"1. Will settle down 2. Will spread furtherTrust in government (presidential job approval rating) "Do you approve or disapprove of the way President Park Geun-hye is handling her job as president?"

back_matter.text: "What is the highest degree or level of school you have completed?"
